alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northern Humboldt Interior; Northwestern Mendocino Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 28 at 4:46AM PDT until October 28 at 10:00AM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30. * WHERE...Northern Humboldt Interior, Southern Humboldt Interior, Northwestern Mendocino Interior and Northeastern Mendocino Interior Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Provide adequate shelter for outdoor pets or consider bringing them indoors. Frost Advisories and Freeze Warnings are issued during the local growing season as defined by climatology and local agriculture experts. Once the growing season has ended these statements will no longer be issued until the spring.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northern Humboldt Interior; Northwestern Mendocino Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior
